primCategory.name: globalMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials not specific to a single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Wall material
Need vacuum for some 'solids'

primCategory.name: globalCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects more inclusive than a single subsystem; also other integer constants used in identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of towers in x.
Number of towers in y.
Id field value for CAL (within towers)
Id field value for TKR (within towers)
Id field value for grid (within towers)
Id field value for LAT
Id field value for solar panels
Id field value for spacecraft
id field for towers (within LAT)
id field for ACD (within LAT)
id field for pieces of grid not within tower envelopes
id field used for TKR Si and CAL layers
id field used for TKR Si and CAL layers

primCategory.name: globalDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions and offsets for objects not associated with any single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Spacing between tracker and calorimeter stay-clear envelopes
gap between modules
Wall thickness
width of tower, including walls. [obsolete?? use CAL and TKR stay-clears instead]
Distance between centers of towers (X or Y) [from LAT-DS-00123-2]

primCategory.name: CALMatPrim
primCategory.prim: Crystal Material
Diode Material
**NEW** CAL composite cell material, also used for top and bottom plates
**NEW** Material for printed circuit boards
Material for CAL frame
Material for CAL mount tabs
Material for CAL (bottom) ribs
Material for CAL cylindrical supports.
Material for cell walls, reinforcement
Wrap material for CsI logs [obsolete??]
Material for space between CAL layers [obsolete??]
Material for CAL grid [obsolete??]
Material for CAL flange [obsolete??]

primCategory.name: CALCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts for replicated objects in the Calorimeter; other integer constants used to keep track of identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of layers of CAL CsI crystals
Number of crystals per layer within a tower
Number of ribs in bottom frame grid in one direction (X or Y)
idField value for CAL cell cmp field (the CsI crystal)
idField value for CAL cell cmp field diode(minus, small)
idField value for CAL cell cmp field diode(plus, small)
idField value for CAL cell cmp field diode(minus, large)
idField value for CAL cell cmp diode(plus, large)
idField value for CAL cell component for cell wall.

primCategory.name: CALDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions of solids and offsets for the Calorimeter
primCategory.prim: Transverse dimension of CAL Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
Z-dimension of CAL Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
**NEW** Depletion depth of diode Si
**NEW** Width of large diode Si
**NEW** Width of small diode Si
**NEW** Height of diode Si
**NEW VALUE** Length of a CsI crystal.
**NEW VALUE** (Transverse) width of a CsI crytal
**NEW VALUE** Height of a CsI crystal
Z offset of diodes relative to crystal
Y (transverse) offset of large diode relative to crystal
Y offset of small diode relative to crystal
**NEW** Vertical pitch of CsI and cells
**NEW** Horizontal pitch of CsI and cells
**NEW** Thickness of reflector and composite cell vertical walls (C)
**NEW** Thickness of reflector and composite cell horizontal walls (C)
**NEW and not understood** Horizontal thickness of reinforcement on side of outermost cells (C)
**NEW** Horizontal thickness of side compartment with electronics
**NEW** Horizontal thickness of inner wall within (largely hollow) side wall
**NEW** Horizontal thickness of outer wall within (largely hollow) side wall
**NEW** Horizontal thickness of PCB within (largely hollow) side wall
**NEW** Horizontal, face-to-face dimension of CAL module (presumably both X and Y)
**NEW** Vertical, top-to-bottom dimention of CAL module
**NEW** Diameter of cylindrical supports (Al)
**NEW** Number of cells between adjacent (in the same layer) cylindrical supports
Thickness of CAL frame sides
Thickness of top and bottom of CAL frame [partially obsolete]
Thickness of top of CAL frame (Al)
Thickness of bottom of CAL frame (Al)
Width of top picture frame (Al)
Width of bottom picture frame (Al)
Vertical thickness of CAL top plate composite
Vertical thickness of CAL bottom plate composite
Pitch of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Width of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Thickness of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Thickness of CAL mounting tabs, CAL to grid (Al)
Width of CAL mounting tabs

primCategory.name: TKRMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the TKR description
primCategory.prim: material used in tracker conversion
Material of tracker detector elements
material used in tracker tray core
Material of tracker face sheet
***Temporary until the correct value can be inserted ***
***Temporary until the correct value can be inserted ***
***Temporary until the correct value can be inserted. For now there is only one sort of CarbonFiber which is the one used in CAL cell walls ***

primCategory.name: TKRCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the tracker.
primCategory.prim: Number of strips per wafer
Wafers for a layer within a tower form a square array of this dimension
number of trays (one more than number of x-y planes)
number of trays with no converter. These trays have the lowest tray number
number of trays with super-Glast thickness converter. These are immediately above the no-lead trays
Number of front-end readout strips per die (determines number of Si strips)
Field value for Si field (bottom of tray)
Field value for Si field (top of tray)
Field value for converter

primCategory.name: TKRDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the Tracker.
primCategory.prim: Tranverse dimension of TKR Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
Z dimension of TKR Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
Si thickness
Thickness of core material in all trays except the bottom and top
Core thickness for bottom and top trays (15oct01)
Thickness of glue between Si and bias plane
Thickness of glue between core (or closeout) and something else (15oct01)
Default glue thickness, when neither Si nor core is involved (15oct01)
Thickness of conversion material in "regular" layers in mm
Thickness of conversion material in super-GLAST layers in mm (as of 15 oct 2001)
Face sheet thickness for all but super-glast layers (as of 15oct01)
Face sheet thickness for super-glast layers (15oct01)
Thickness of bias plane (15oct01)
Gap between top of one tray and bottom of the tray above **obsolete by 19oct01! gaps now vary **
Gap above bottom tray
Gap above non-bottom no-converter trays
Gap above super-glast trays
Gap above regular trays
Height of a tracker tower
gap between Si dies within a ladder (15oct01)
Length and width of Si wafer
Length and width of active area on a wafer
**Is this just a replacement for wallWidth?
X and y width of face sheet (15oct01)
**Insert comment here**
gap between ladders
guard ring size. Probably irrelevant.

primCategory.name: ACDMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the ACD description
primCategory.prim: material used for tiles
Material of ACD support. Still need input from engineers about this.
Material for scintillating tape

primCategory.name: ACDCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Number of tiles across top in x direction
Number of tiles across top in y direction
Number of gaps (long axis = Z) to be covered by scintillating tape on each side o the ACD. Should this be derived from #tiles in some side row?
Number of rows of tiles along the sides
Row number of first short row
Row number of last short row
Number of tiles in some (currently upper two) side rows
Number of tiles in some (currently lower two) side rows
Top of ACD
Neg. x face
Neg. y face
Pos. x face
Pos. y face

primCategory.name: ACDDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Thickness of ACD tiles
This is just a figment of my imagination. I have no real number yet.
This one is right if side_standoff is another name for side_tile_standoff, the distance between the side of the tracker and the ACD tiles
This is the total amount of space available to top section of the ACD, includes tiles and support structure (Heather).
Worst-case (most thermal expansion) gap between tiles on the top
distance between ACD top and top of TKR
Width of overlap of overlapped top tiles
Total amount of space available for side section of ACD, including both tiles and support structure
Height of top row of side tiles
Height of 2nd row of side tiles
Height of 3rd row of side tiles
Height of 4th row of side tiles
Distance side tiles extend above topACD tile surface --- used for positioning
Vertical gap between (rows of?) side tiles
Horizontal gap at the corners between adjacent sides of tiles
Thickness of scintillating tape
Width of scintillating tape
Distance tape should extend beyond the end of a top tile (see Heather's first diagram)
Distance between the tape and the adjacent ACD tile

primCategory.name: NADDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundametal dimensions of solids and offset for NAD (Not A Detector) components, like the grid.
primCategory.prim: Full thickness of grid between towers (not half-width)
Thickness of grid on outside towers
Height of grid web
Cut-outs for calorimeters
Height of grid flange
Cutouts in the flange
Thickness of inner parts of grid flange
Flange overhangs web

derCategory.name: derACD
derCategory.overview: Derived constants specific to the ACD

derCategory.name: derGlobal
derCategory.overview: A few more constants needed for the outermost LAT compositions
